inventory=[{"type": "cod", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 44, "index": 17}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 15, "index": 25}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 52, "index": 28}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 4, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a spectral_arrow, I first need to craft an arrow. An arrow requires placing 1 flint and 1 stick side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the flint from slot 40 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
